Home Wiki
JQuery DataTable Column Filter - Default Example

Preamble

DataTables ColumnFilter plugin add filtering boxes into the table footer.

Live example

Initialization code

Initialization code is very simple. You just need to add columnFilter() call to the DataTable instance. By default filters for the text searches will be added to each footer cell.

$(document).ready( function () {
		$('#example').dataTable().columnFilter();
}

Additional HTML code

In the default mode you will need to have a valid table footer in the table as shown in the following example:

	<tfoot>
		<tr>
			<th>Rendering engine</th>
			<th>Browser</th>
			<th>Platform(s)</th>
			<th>Engine version</th>
			<th>CSS grade</th>
		</tr>
	</tfoot>
